data.name: Netflix clone
data.stack: React Js, Express Js, MongoDB, Tailwind CSS
data.description: This is a full  netflix light clone which have provides functionality of watching trailers and movies according to selected genere and also has working authentication and authorizastion system

data.name: Tour and Tourism API
data.description: This is a fully functional API which provides various tours and their information to clients and also has working authentication and authorizastion system,

data.name: Text Converter
data.description: This is a simple react app which performs various operations on entered text such as capitalizing words or replacing a specific word

data.name: Infinity Quest-Pygame
data.description: This is a 2D game made with pygame. The game is similar to famous game super mario. This game won Python Hackathon 2022,IIT Bombay
